content: these big & thick dish scrubbies are absolutely the best scrubbies you ll ever use they are super easy to make and come together in less than 30 minutes plus they hold up to dish washing pot scrubbing and machine washing for months to years **difficulty level ** beginner **finished dimensions ** about 4 5-5 - inches length by 3 5-4 - inches width *pattern is written in us terms * **skills ** chain stitch chain/chs single_crochet single_crochet
